attributes.action: Take Child Protection away from Local Councils &familie Courts.
attributes.additional_details:
With Child Protection failing Children up and down the Country,finally the Government MUST step in.

.Stop The Family Court Judges,chapionion Social Services.

.Stop the Police champion Social Services.

Give Families permission to hold failing Staff in Child protection to account.

Prison sentences to be passed down to inderviduales who fail in authority to protect children.
